DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate incidence sexual dysfunction presence dysthyroidism impact restore euthyroidism female sexual function
DOC.detailed_description: Hormonal component play crucial role sexual function . Hypothyroidism hyperthyroidism may associate form sexual dysfunction men study report relationship thyroid dysfunction female sexuality . The study observational study . An informed consent obtain patient study . The aim study : - evaluate incidence sexual dysfunction presence dysthyroidism impact restore euthyroidism female sexual function ( evaluate Female Sexual Function Index ) - evaluate influence hormonal change emotional psychological wellness ( evalueted Middle Sex Hospital Questionnaire ) - evaluate influence hormonal change satisfaction body image ( evalueted Body Uneasiness Test ) - evaluate influence hormonal change distress relate sexuality ( evaluate Female Sexual Distress Scale ) . The investigator espect enroll total 50 sexually active hyperthyroidic/hypothyroidic woman study 7 month . Statistical analysis perform use Statistical Package Social Sciences
DOC.criteria: informed consent hyperthyroidic hypothyroiditic woman sexually active woman age < 18 Y sexual activity pregnancy psychiatric disease
